Sentencas: Simulation of the power grid including numerous microgrids (MGs) with complex and detailed model (DM) is very time-consuming.
Titulo: Equivalent model parameter estimation of grid-connected fuel cell-based microgrid

Sentencas: Nevertheless, these kinds of simulations are vital for power engineers and utilities to analyze the impact of dynamic interconnections among MGs and the power grid.
Titulo: Equivalent model parameter estimation of grid-connected fuel cell-based microgrid

Sentencas: In this paper, an electrical equivalent model (EM) including electrical components, such as an equivalent solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) model, voltage source converter (VSC), and static load, is proposed for a fuel cell-based MG.
Titulo: Equivalent model parameter estimation of grid-connected fuel cell-based microgrid

Sentencas: The parameters of the EM are estimated to behave similar to the DM of the MG in different scenarios and operating points.
Titulo: Equivalent model parameter estimation of grid-connected fuel cell-based microgrid

Sentencas: The parameter estimation procedure is conducted using genetic algorithm.
Titulo: Equivalent model parameter estimation of grid-connected fuel cell-based microgrid

Sentencas: The IEEE 9-Bus transmission system is considered as the main grid, while the IEEE 33-Bus distribution system is considered as the grid-connected MG.
Titulo: Equivalent model parameter estimation of grid-connected fuel cell-based microgrid

Sentencas: Three SOFCs of different size and dynamic parameters are connected through VSCs to the MG.
Titulo: Equivalent model parameter estimation of grid-connected fuel cell-based microgrid

Sentencas: Different scenarios of active and reactive power changes are simulated, and results of the EM and DM are compared, to demonstrate the accuracy of the determined EM.
Titulo: Equivalent model parameter estimation of grid-connected fuel cell-based microgrid
